definition: after all/to investigate/to study carefully/Taiwan pr. [jiu4]
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Hanna, female, a master graduate in vacuum and fluid engineering center.
sentences.chinese: 韓娜，女，真空與流體工程研究中心碩士研究生。

sentences.english: Total first-time enrolment of international graduate students rose 12 per cent this year.
sentences.chinese: 新錄取的國際研究生總人數今年增加了12%。

sentences.english: Well, if I had the option, I would really like to go to grad school for linguistics.
sentences.chinese: 如果可以選擇的話，我真的很想去讀語言學的研究生。

sentences.english: I graduated from Shanghai International Studies University, my major is English, and i passed TEM-8 with a high mark.
sentences.chinese: 英語專業八級，上海外國語大學研究生畢業。

sentences.english: He received the master degree of China Art Academy.
sentences.chinese: 中國藝術研究院美術學碩士研究生。

sentences.english: So every year an increasing number of college stu dents take the post-graduate entrance examination.
sentences.chinese: 因此，每年有越來越多的大學生參加研究生入學考試。

sentences.english: There are already 1.96 million university students in Britain and 1.2 million higher education students, according to the Department for Innovation, Universities and Skills.
sentences.chinese: 在英國，現在有196萬大學生和120萬研究生。

sentences.english: This course is an elective course for graduate students in School of Mechanical Engineering.
sentences.chinese: 本課程是機械與動力工程學院研究生的一門選修課。

sentences.english: Investigation was carried out for water penetration into moso bamboo (Phyllostachys pubescens), grown in Fuyang, Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 研究生長於浙江省富陽的毛竹的水分浸入特性。

sentences.english: Currently I am an international student at Graduate School of Int'l Studies, Korea University, Seoul, Korea.
sentences.chinese: 我目前就讀於韓國高麗大學國際研究生院。

sentences.english: More than half had postgraduate degrees.
sentences.chinese: 超過半數以上擁有研究生學位。

sentences.english: Assistantships are just jobs paid with money or free classes.
sentences.chinese: 研究生助教獎學金是支付金錢或者免費課程的工作。

sentences.english: You were the dean of the graduate school.
sentences.chinese: 您曾經是研究生院院長。

sentences.english: I'm a post-graduate of Beijing University.
sentences.chinese: 我是北京大學的一名研究生。

sentences.english: University teachers do graduate and doctoral entrance exam questions will be, too.
sentences.chinese: 大學老師做研究生和博士生入學考試試題也會如此。

definition: master's degree/person who has a master's degree/learned person
to recommend sb for postgraduate studies/to admit for postgraduate studies without taking the entrance exam
the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism
to join the faculty of one's alma mater upon graduation/to remain at school during vacation
science and engineering as academic subjects
doctoral degree/PhD/same as Doctor of Philosophy 哲學博士學位|哲学博士学位
